Sentencas: The objective of this work is to suggest a method for optimizing the compressor and turbine components in hybrid SOFC-GT (Solid Oxide Fuel Cell - Gas Turbine) applications.
Titulo: Optimization methodology of turbomachines for hybrid SOFC-GT applications

Sentencas: The hybrid system evaluations are made on the basis of a typical SOFC generator scheme without any modifications.
Titulo: Optimization methodology of turbomachines for hybrid SOFC-GT applications

Sentencas: The method consists of two steps.
Titulo: Optimization methodology of turbomachines for hybrid SOFC-GT applications

Sentencas: A parametric study is conducted in order to assess the operating range of the hybrid SOFC-GT system and select the desired operating line for achieving the optimum system efficiency at various operating points.
Titulo: Optimization methodology of turbomachines for hybrid SOFC-GT applications

Sentencas: Based on that information, optimum compressor and turbine geometries are estimated using in-house turbomachinery design codes and an optimization procedure.
Titulo: Optimization methodology of turbomachines for hybrid SOFC-GT applications

Sentencas: The new components ensure the best performance not only in the design point but also during part-load operation.
Titulo: Optimization methodology of turbomachines for hybrid SOFC-GT applications

Sentencas: The results of the present analysis are useful for designing hybrid SOFC-GT systems based on a fixed SOFC generator design.
Titulo: Optimization methodology of turbomachines for hybrid SOFC-GT applications
